title: 30-Day SSC CGL Cracker Plan
description: A structured 30-day study plan covering all four sections of SSC CGL: Quantitative Aptitude, General Intelligence & Reasoning, English Language, and General Awareness. Based on Rahul Sir's proven methodology.
